<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This class define an interface similar to the LTOCodeGenerator, but adapted</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The ThinLTOCodeGenerator is not intended to be reuse for multiple</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">/// compilation: the model is that the client adds modules to the generator and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ask to perform the ThinLTO optimizations / codegen, and finally destroys the</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42; ThinLTO files. If the ThinLTO CodeGenerator can ensure that every</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42; @&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">  /&#42;&#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42; \\defgroup Cache controlling options</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42; These entry points control the ThinLTO cache. The cache is intended to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42; support incremental build, and thus needs to be persistent accross build.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42; The client enabled the cache by supplying a path to an existing directory.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42; The code generator will use this to store objects files that may be reused</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42; during a subsequent build.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42; To avoid filling the disk space, a few knobs are provided:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42;  - The pruning interval limit the frequency at which the garbage collector</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42;    will try to scan the cache directory to prune it from expired entries.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42;    Setting to -1 disable the pruning (default). Setting to 0 will force</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42;    pruning to occur.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42;  - The pruning expiration time indicates to the garbage collector how old</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42;    an entry needs to be to be removed.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42;  - Finally, the garbage collector can be instructed to prune the cache till</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42;    the occupied space goes below a threshold.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42; @&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/thinltocodegenerator/cachingoptions"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/thinltocodegenerator/cachingoptions">CachingOptions</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/thinltocodegenerator/cachingoptions/#aec4d0b35e16bcaf5522500a0e9b010e3"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::string <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/thinltocodegenerator/cachingoptions/#aec4d0b35e16bcaf5522500a0e9b010e3">Path</a>;                    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Path to the cache, empty to disable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/thinltocodegenerator/cachingoptions/#a0c6cbe7cffe024542cc0447130db89a3"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cachepruningpolicy">CachePruningPolicy</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/thinltocodegenerator/cachingoptions/#a0c6cbe7cffe024542cc0447130db89a3">Policy</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Provide a path to a directory where to store the cached files for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// incremental build.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139" lineLink="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga13ac54ea2d670ae2b55c55d552ae2d2d"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga13ac54ea2d670ae2b55c55d552ae2d2d">setCacheDir</a>(std::string Path) &#123; CacheOptions.Path = std::move(Path); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Cache policy: interval (seconds) between two prunes of the cache. Set to a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// negative value to disable pruning. A value of 0 will force pruning to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// occur.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144" lineLink="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga190f2d73ac70288b5323a0881fa0c727"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga190f2d73ac70288b5323a0881fa0c727">setCachePruningInterval</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/msf/mappedblockstream-cpp/#a4ab9bd667f674c16b2cee01ab8823644">Interval</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/msf/mappedblockstream-cpp/#a4ab9bd667f674c16b2cee01ab8823644">Interval</a> &lt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">      CacheOptions.Policy.Interval.reset();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">      CacheOptions.Policy.Interval = std::chrono::seconds(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/msf/mappedblockstream-cpp/#a4ab9bd667f674c16b2cee01ab8823644">Interval</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Cache policy: expiration (in seconds) for an entry.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A value of 0 will be ignored.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153" lineLink="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga5ba128cec363595b8cb8d403509b71d7"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga5ba128cec363595b8cb8d403509b71d7">setCacheEntryExpiration</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Expiration) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Expiration)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">      CacheOptions.Policy.Expiration = std::chrono::seconds(Expiration);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="comment">  /&#42;&#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42; Sets the maximum cache size that can be persistent across build, in terms</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42; of percentage of the available space on the disk. Set to 100 to indicate</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42; no limit, 50 to indicate that the cache size will not be left over</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42; half the available space. A value over 100 will be reduced to 100, and a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42; value of 0 will be ignored.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42; The formula looks like:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42;  AvailableSpace = FreeSpace + ExistingCacheSize</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42;  NewCacheSize = AvailableSpace &#42; P/100</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">   &#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171" lineLink="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga724a34dbf10eb5f09062e52237ea0e96"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga724a34dbf10eb5f09062e52237ea0e96">setMaxCacheSizeRelativeToAvailableSpace</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Percentage) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Percentage)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">      CacheOptions.Policy.MaxSizePercentageOfAvailableSpace = Percentage;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Cache policy: the maximum size for the cache directory in bytes. A value</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// over the amount of available space on the disk will be reduced to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// amount of available space. A value of 0 will be ignored.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179" lineLink="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga755ef880ddfb2ecdf8b5cae2d611dd78"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/cache/#ga755ef880ddfb2ecdf8b5cae2d611dd78">setCacheMaxSizeBytes</a>(uint64&#95;t MaxSizeBytes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MaxSizeBytes)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">      CacheOptions.Policy.MaxSizeBytes = MaxSizeBytes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Cache policy: the maximum number of files in the cache directory. A value</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// of 0 will be ignored.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186" lineLink="/docs/api/groups/cache/#gaca3298ccd1bd11e22a2119a0868177b4"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/cache/#gaca3298ccd1bd11e22a2119a0868177b4">setCacheMaxSizeFiles</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxSizeFiles) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="comment">  /&#42;&#42;@&#125;&#42;/</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226" lineLink="/docs/api/groups/options/#gaf7173a7c59d405dc4c0584e34a911aba"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/options/#gaf7173a7c59d405dc4c0584e34a911aba">setCodeGenOptLevel</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8ec1bf8d7b792ca9fac56f8514db18d2">CodeGenOptLevel</a> CGOptLevel) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// IR optimization level: from 0 to 3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231" lineLink="/docs/api/groups/options/#ga334de45431629a925ce1574f8f23ef04"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/options/#ga334de45431629a925ce1574f8f23ef04">setOptLevel</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewOptLevel) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Enable or disable debug output for the new pass manager.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236" lineLink="/docs/api/groups/options/#gac980489ed9310beb8f24ce41327b39cd"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/options/#gac980489ed9310beb8f24ce41327b39cd">setDebugPassManager</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/statistic-cpp/#a558f5c44426d0eb7abb82a65e8892d9a">Enabled</a>) &#123; DebugPassManager = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/statistic-cpp/#a558f5c44426d0eb7abb82a65e8892d9a">Enabled</a>; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Disable CodeGen, only run the stages till codegen and stop. The output</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// will be bitcode.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240" lineLink="/docs/api/groups/options/#ga0dc161026c3eab1a29f8d0af89900455"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/options/#ga0dc161026c3eab1a29f8d0af89900455">disableCodeGen</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afdccf3ff7a8dfaa084b07c1fb417bbe2abcfaccebf745acfd5e75351095a5394a">Disable</a>) &#123; DisableCodeGen = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#afdccf3ff7a8dfaa084b07c1fb417bbe2abcfaccebf745acfd5e75351095a5394a">Disable</a>; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
